body.name: BY4U Steamer for Clothes, Portable Handheld Garment Steamer, 1lbs Lightly,40s Fast Heat-up, 8 Minutes of Continuous Steam, Light Mini Steamer for Home, Office and Travel (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: 【100% Two-Year Warranty】This Clothes Steamer support 2-years free exchange service. If you have any problem with the product, you can contact us and we will provide you with a solution within 24 hours.

【Improved Nozzle】- Get the newest portable steamer for clothes design includes a new nozzle design that distributes steam powerfully and consistently to enjoy wrinkle-free. This clothes steamer is Safe to use on all types of clothes including household fabric like furniture upholstery, bedding, drapery, and tablecloth.

【Fast-Heating Water Tank】- Easy-fill water tank using one on/off switch, takes only 40 seconds heat-up handheld steamer and lasts up to 8 minutes of continuous steaming to emit wrinkle-busting perfectly.

【Lightwelght & Compact】-Compact design travels and stores easily .Its compact size and weight (1 pounds) with a high capacity of 130Ml made this clothes steamer perfect for travel, easily fit in a suitcase.
【Safe to Use】 - Automatic shut-off safety protection when a unit gets too hot or too low in the water. "USER MANUAL" included - please read it carefully for safety and perfect use.

Notes: Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended.(not exceed the maximum level line)If you encounter product failure or water spray, please immediately contact our after-sales customer service team for commodity replacement service.
Tip for use: After use, remember to unplug the power and pour out the remaining water in the sink.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BY4U Steamer for Clothes BY4U Steamer for Clothes Wrinkle Removes Item Weight: 1 pounds. Water Tank Capacity: 130 milliliters. Steam ready time: 40 seconds Steam Duration: 8 minutes. Voltage: 110V - 120V Wattage: 700W - 800W Do you have problems with clothes wrinkles in your daily life Now we strongly recommend this handheld steamer. It can also use to remove wrinkles in clothes, cushions, beds and other fabrics around the house.

Usage Tips! Notes: 1. Never turn the unit upside down. Your Travel Garment Steamer should never be tilted past a 45-degree angle especially when the unit is ON. Never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself. 2. The mist is super hot, please keep away from the hot steam. 3. Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended. 4. Please use a transformer that can convert the voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

Easy Operation: 1. Rotate the nozzle head, and open the steamer. And then fill the tank with cold water to the desired level(not exceed the maximum level line). When you finish filling, lock the head back on. 2. Turn the ON/OFF switch to the ON position. The switch light indicates the steamer is on. The steamer will emit steam from nozzle in 2 minutes. 3. After about 8 minutes of continuous steaming, or the steamer runs out of the water, it will reset automatically to ensure your safety while leaving the indicator light ON. 4. When you are finished with your steaming session place the ON/OFF switch in the OFF position and remove the plug from the outlet.
Lightwelght and Compact.1lbs Lightly,40s Fast Heat-up, 8 Minutes of Continuous Steam,8FT Long Power Cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy to get it this product works so good. Easy, light if you travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and works well.
reviews.reviewText: It works very well, just don't tilt it too much and don't over fill it. If you fill it beyond the fill line, the device is likely to start sputtering water. Follow the instructions and all is well. It's a great steamer, is attractively built and is inexpensive. Knowing how much some of these steamer devices cost makes me like this inexpensive one even more. It's a solid little steamer for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Steamed Well but…
reviews.reviewText: Steamed well, but will spit water out on your clothes. Not good when you’re trying to steam your bridesmaid dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my go-to solution for quick and effective wrinkle removal
reviews.reviewText: the lightweight design of this steamer is a game-changer. Weighing just 1 pound, it's incredibly easy to handle, making it perfect for use at home, in the office, or while traveling. The compact size also adds to its portability, fitting easily into my luggage or carry-on.The fast heat-up time is one of its standout features. In just 40 seconds, the steamer is ready to use, allowing me to quickly refresh my clothes before heading out. This speed is particularly useful for busy mornings or when I need to look presentable in a hurry.Once heated, the steamer provides a continuous steam flow for a generous 8 minutes. This is ample time to de-wrinkle several clothing items efficiently. It's a great alternative to traditional irons, especially when I'm dealing with delicate fabrics that can't withstand direct contact with an iron.The simplicity of operation is noteworthy. There's no need for a complex setup or extensive learning curve. Just fill the water reservoir, plug it in, and you're ready to start steaming. The one-button control makes it user-friendly, even for those who are new to garment steamers.Its versatility is another key strength. I've used it on a variety of fabrics, from cotton and linen to silk and synthetics, and it has effectively removed wrinkles without causing any damage. It's become an essential tool for refreshing clothes that have been packed in a suitcase or stored for a while.In summary, the BY4U Steamer for Clothes has become my go-to solution for quick and effective wrinkle removal. Its lightweight and compact design, fast heat-up time, continuous steam flow, ease of use, and versatility make it an excellent investment for anyone who values keeping their clothes looking crisp and well-maintained, whether at home or on the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderfully Useful Product
reviews.reviewText: Very versatile and useful! Easy to use. Gets the job done quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Spit out water onto clothing
reviews.reviewText: This steamer I wouldn’t recommend. I bought it for traveling it spit out water on my clothes then died after one use. First and only steam did not work properly. I was traveling to long to return in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It steams but limited
reviews.reviewText: use distilled water. It holds enough to steam one garment. It does get very hot. It's OK for the price. It takes most of the wrinkles out but not quickly. It left a white streak on the first shirt I tried it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: There are a lot of mixed reviews for this litter steamer. I got it for a cruise. This thing is fantastic!! I tested it on my new curtains. Worked like a charm. It's for travel. So it is small and requires refills, but it heats quickly and works perfectly as long as you steam correctly.
